dcterms:creator: H. Chen
H. Shi
dcterms:description: The Spontaneous Micro-Gesture (SMG) dataset presents data on stress and micro-gesture, comprising 821056 frames, equivalent to 8 hours of video data from 40 adults, captured in a lab environment.
dcterms:title: Spontaneous Micro-Gesture (SMG) dataset

dcterms:creator: W.-K. Beh
Y.-H. Wu
dcterms:description: The Mental workload Assessment on n-back task Using wearable Sensor (MAUS) dataset was collected from 22 adults in a lab using physiological sensors to study stress and mental workload.
dcterms:title: Mental workload Assessment on n-back task Using wearable Sensor (MAUS) dataset

dcterms:creator: L. Stappen
A. Baird
dcterms:description: The Ulm Trier Social Stress Test (TSST) dataset is a German dataset focusing on public stress, consisting of data from 105 participants, gathered through interviews.
dcterms:title: Ulm Trier Social Stress Test (TSST) dataset
